title: Articles Eligible for Rewrite
content:
[[=]]
++ Pages under a year old rated -10 or below

[[module ListPages date="last 12 month" tag="-archived -in-rewrite -international" rating="<-9" prependLine="||~ Title||~ Created on||~ Author||~ Rating||" perPage="250" separate="no"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_at%%||%%created_by_linked%%||%%rating%%||
[[/module]]

+ @@ @@

++ Pages over one year old rated 0 or below

[[module ListPages date="older than 12 month" tag="scp -archived -in-rewrite -international" rating="<1" prependLine="||~ Title||~ Created on||~ Author||~ Rating||" perPage="250" separate="no"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_at%%||%%created_by_linked%%||%%rating%%||
[[/module]]

+ @@ @@

++ Pages over two years old rated +10 or below

[[module ListPages date="older than 24 month" tag="scp -archived -in-rewrite -international" rating="<11" prependLine="||~ Title||~ Created on||~ Author||~ Rating||" perPage="250" separate="no"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_at%%||%%created_by_linked%%||[[#ifexpr %%rating%%>0 | + | ]]%%rating%%||
[[/module]]
[[/=]]

+ Interested in rewriting one of the articles on these lists?

# First, ask for author permission. This can be done by going to http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/USERNAME and sending them a private message.
# If the author does not respond after a week, feel free to send a message to a member of the rewrite team indicating your interest and mentioning that the original author did not reply within a week.
 * Following rewrite approval, the page will be tagged in-rewrite and it's all yours from there! A more detailed explanation of the process can be found in the [[[rewrite-guide |rewrite guide]]].

++ Pages open for rewrite at author request

[[module ListPages tag="rewritable" prependLine="||~ Title||~ Created on||~ Author||~ Rating||" perPage="250" separate="no"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_at%%||%%created_by_linked%%||%%rating%%||
[[/module]]

+ @@ @@

Note that this is not an exhaustive list of articles open for rewrite outside of standard conditions.

+ Interested in rewriting one of the articles on this list?

# Contact one of the Rewrite team members to show your interest in rewriting the article. You can find an up-to-date overview of Rewrite team members in the [[[rewrite guide]]].
 * Following rewrite approval, the page will be tagged in-rewrite and it's all yours from there! A more detailed explanation of the process can be found in the [[[rewrite guide]]].

+ Interested in putting one of your articles up for rewrite?

# Message a member of the Rewrite team stating which articles you wish to put up for rewrite. The list of team members can be found on:
 * [/rewrite-guide The rewrite guide]
 * [http://05command.wikidot.com/rewrite-main The team's hub on the staff site]
# Once added to the list, users will be free to seek permission from yourself to rewrite the article without intervention of the Rewrite team.
author: Limeyy
